argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I tried to talk to the mouse. First in English, but it didn't respond, so then I tried in French about my cat. The mouse responded frightened. I felt guilty and quite forgot he did not like cats. The mouse was angry and shouted: 'Would you like cats if you were me?' I tried to calm it down, changing the topic to dogs. The mouse finally asked me in a trembling voice: 'Let us get to the shore, and then I will tell you my history, and you will understand why it is I hate cats and dogs.' I followed the mouse and found out that the pool was getting quite crowded with the birds and animals that had fallen into it.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I was not even hurt! I immediately stood up and looked into a long hall.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I was too curious to think about that!

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I was too curious to think about that!

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Because I knew some phrases from my brother's Latin grammar and I thought that would be the best way to talk to a mouse.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: Because I knew some phrases from my brother's Latin grammar and I thought that would be the best way to talk to a mouse.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I was wondering how I was ever to get out again.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I was wondering how I was ever to get out again.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I wished that I hadn't cried so much.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I wished that I hadn't cried so much.

argument.value: I thought I should eat more of the cake to have an effect.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The fan I was holding.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The fan I was holding.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: I thought by myself, I wish I could shut up as a telescope.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: I thought by myself, I wish I could shut up as a telescope.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: The queer thing was that I would be punished if I would be drowned in my own tears.

argument.name: fallback
argument.value: The queer thing was that I would be punished if I would be drowned in my own tears.

argument.name: var.var1
argument.value: Because I know that I didn't have the long ringlets Ada has.

argument.value: I thought that if it makes me grow larger

argument.value: I tried.. But it was too slippery!

argument.value: I tried.. But it was too slippery!

argument.value: I grew so tall that I wasnt able to see my feet anymore.

argument.value: Either the locks were too large or the key was too small.

argument.value: I was surprised that I remained the same size.

argument.value: Because I was able to put on the white kid gloves

argument.value: To feel if I had grown already.

argument.value: Because he thought that I would be savaged if he would kept my waiting

argument.value: I don't know. It makes me sad!

argument.value: I discovered that what I am saying is actually wrong so I must be Mabel after all.
